00008 #ifndef DEBUG_H_
00009 #define DEBUG_H_
00010 
00011 #ifdef DEBUG
00012 #define PRN_(LVL, X) if (Dbg::debugLevel >= LVL) { PRN(X) }
00013 #define VAR_(LVL, X) if (Dbg::debugLevel >= LVL) { VAR(X) }
00014 #define PRNBITS_(LVL, X) if (Dbg::debugLevel >= LVL) { PRNBITS(X) }
00015 
00016 #define PRN(X) Dbg::prnTime(); Dbg::prn("msg:: "); Dbg::prn(__FILE__); Dbg::prn("@"); Dbg::prn(__LINE__); \
00017                                 Dbg::prn(" "); Dbg::prn(X); Dbg::prn("\n");
00018 #define VAR(X) Dbg::prnTime(); Dbg::prn("var::"); Dbg::prn(__FILE__); Dbg::prn("@"); Dbg::prn(__LINE__); \
00019                                 Dbg::prn(": "); Dbg::prn(#X); Dbg::prn(" = "); Dbg::prn(X); Dbg::prn("\n");
00020 #define PRNBITS(X) Dbg::printBits(X);
00021 
00022 #else
00023 #define PRN_(LVL, X)
00024 #define VAR_(LVL, X)
00025 #define PRN(X)
00026 #define VAR(X)
00027 #define PRNBITS(X)
00028 #define PRNBITS_(X, Y)
00029 #endif

00031 #include <string>
00032 #include <iostream>
00033 #include <sstream>
00034 #include "../Util/timer.h"
00035 
00036 using namespace std;
00037 
00038 class Dbg {
00039 public:
00040 
00041         static const int debugLevel = 2;
00042 
00043         static Timer t;
00044 
00045         static bool t_started;
00046 
00047         static void prnTime() {
00048                 if ( ! t_started) {
00049                         t_started = true;
00050                         t.start();
00051                 }
00052                 printf("%ld: ", t.seeTime());
00053         }
00054 
00055         static void prn(string s) {
00056                 cout << s << flush;
00057                 return;
00058         }
00059 
00060         static void prn(long s) {
00061                 stringstream ss;
00062                 ss << s;
00063                 prn(ss.str());
00064         }
00065 
00066         static void prn(int s) {
00067                 stringstream ss;
00068                 ss << s;
00069                 prn(ss.str());
00070         }
00071 
00072         static void prn(char s) {
00073                 stringstream ss;
00074                 ss << s;
00075                 prn(ss.str());
00076         }
00077 
00078         static void printBits(const char* s, int len) {
00079                 int i, j, v;
00080                 for (i = 0; i < len; ++i) {
00081                         v = s[i];
00082                         cout << "[" << i << "]=<";
00083                         for (j = 0; j < 8; ++j) {
00084                                 cout << (((v >> (7 - j)) & 0x01) ? 1 : 0);
00085                         }
00086                         cout << "> ";
00087                 }
00088                 cout << endl << flush;
00089         }
00090         static void printBits(string s) {
00091                 printBits(s.data(), s.length());
00092         }
00093 };
